::Prowl::

Prowl watches Iron Raptor emerge from behind Snow Tech's shield,=
 
hearing her thoughts as well as catching her look. His anger was 
quickly=
 dissapearing. Prowl looks over at Shadow Cat and Snow Tech.

<We can leave=
 them behind, you know...- he thinks jokingly to Iron 
Raptor, his metallic=
 wings stretching out behind him. His boosters 
power up and get ready to l=
ift off.

-Would you like a nice slow flight or an insanely fast one, love?=
- he 
asks her. He hoped Shadow Cat would hurry up and get Snow Tech out of=
 
here so Prowl and Iron Raptor could be on their way.
